author: Joe Sommerlad, Joe Sommerlad
title: Coronavirus: China holds national 'wail of grief' to remember Covid-19 victims
description: Citizens bearing flowers bow heads in silence for three minutes as horns and air raid sirens sound to honour country's 3,300 dead
content:
China held a three-minute national moment of reflection on Saturday morning to honour those killed by the coronavirus outbreak, as the global number of cases passed the one million mark with the international death toll surpassing 58,000.
